review: Despite the substantial hardware compare to some of its rivals, it has the occasional lags/stutters in Netflix. Every now and then Netflix audio/video would pause/drop for like a second or so, very frustrating. I've experience this shortly after purchasing this last year, hoping that this will be addressed in later firmware, but the issue remained and never got better. I also have a chromecast and it does not have this problem, despite running on inferior hardware.Interestingly, Amazon prime videos does not stutter or lag. I now wonder if this is done (or not fixing it) on purpose. I also noticed other users on reddit/avsforum mentioning the same problem. I don't recommend this for Netflix use.The Apple TV (gen3 is pretty cheap now) provides a vastly superior Netflix experience. No stutter/lag at all.
